com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands

Class DeployDatabaseFieldCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.ext.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.AbstractCommand
        • com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.databases.DeployDatabaseCommand
          • com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands.DeployDatabaseFieldCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.Command, com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.UndoableCommand

    public class DeployDatabaseFieldCommand
extends com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.databases.DeployDatabaseCommand
    Per DHFPROD-2554, this command ensures that when it adds DHF-specific fields and range field indexes to the staging, final, and jobs databases, it will not drop any existing fields or range field indexes.

    The reason that these fields are applied via an XML file is to avoid a bug specific to JSON files and the Manage API that is not yet fixed in ML 9.0-9.
